name: iot3-utility
description: A utility to load csv files into Watson IOT

scripts.example: node iot3.js -d DTT001 -t DannyDeviceType -f 'test/MockData.csv' -e EV01 -T '' --ignoreColumn ROWID  -dryRun -v
scripts.example_2: node iot3.js -d DTT001 -t DannyDeviceType -f 'test/MockData.csv' -e EV01 -T '' --ignoreColumn ROWID -v
